title: E-Learn
description: A full-featured LMS built with the MERN stack. It allows users to enroll in courses, track progress, and access educational content in an interactive way.

title: E-Commerce
description: A complete e-commerce web application supporting product listings, cart management, secure checkout, and order tracking built using the MERN stack.
